data.meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force
data.sentence: The word غُلِبَتِ comes from the root غ ل ب and is associated with the meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force

data.meanings: desired/sought after, to seek/search, to wait/pause/expect, be patient, to mock/ridicule. Greeks, Byzantines, Romans.
data.sentence: The word الرُّومُ comes from the root ر و م and is associated with the meanings: desired/sought after, to seek/search, to wait/pause/expect, be patient, to mock/ridicule. Greeks, Byzantines, Romans.
